segments.text: I see the boy is really struggling to reach those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's standing on his tiptoes, trying to get a better grip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit nervous for him, he looks like he might fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is so patient, just waiting for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's got her hand out, ready to catch one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely oblivious, just drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she'll be surprised when she sees the water all over the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so calm, it's a nice contrast to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the children are careful, I don't want to see them get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bit funny, watching them sneak those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I'm watching a play, everything happening right in front of me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope everything turns out okay, but I'm not sure it will.
segments.speaker: PAR
